title: BIKE24
description: European online retailer for bikes, components, and accessories with wide brand coverage. Offers international shipping and detailed product filters.

title: Alltricks
description: French retailer for bikes, components, and running/outdoor gear. Known for frequent stock of European brands and fast delivery in the EU.

title: Bike-Discount
description: German retailer known for competitive pricing on parts, tools, and accessories. Stocks major component and apparel brands.

title: Bikester
description: Online bike shop covering road, MTB, gravel, and urban with apparel and parts. Operates localized stores in multiple European markets.

title: Sigma Sports
description: UK-based retailer with road, triathlon, and performance cycling focus. Offers bike fitting, workshops, and extensive online catalog.

title: ROSE Bikes
description: German brand and retailer selling own bikes plus parts and gear. Known for direct-sales bikes and customization options.

title: Bikeinn
description: Cycling-focused shop within the Tradeinn group offering broad gear selection. Ships internationally with multiple warehouse locations.
